value:
This hall seems lovelier every time
I see it. I'm convinced it would be a
wonderful spot for a ball or banquet.

I can tell that you treasure your home
as much as I do mine. For that reason,
I will do all I can to protect it.

How can I show you my gratitude?
Hmm... I know! Tell me your favorite
food—I'll get you a lifetime supply.

Your weapon is made of a most
fascinating metal. The craftsmanship
is very impressive too.

As much as I strive to be dazzling,
there are times when I have to set
appearances aside for training's sake.

What a lovely castle you have! Oh,
I've brought you a little something
from $Nf. Here.

I've attained something valuable and
rare by my own hands...and I plan to
celebrate it.

Oh, I'm so delighted! I feel as if I've
just arrived at a banquet.

Oh, my... Perhaps I'll do better
next time.

I am so grateful for this wonderful
gift. It's every bit as thrilling as the
first dance at a ball!

How do you do? I'm Citrinne, a royal
soldier of Brodia. It's an honor to be
here. Thank you for inviting me.

Let me take a moment to express to
you how delighted I've been with my
time here, $Nu.$k$pEvery day has presented me with
new opportunities to meet people
from all manner of backgrounds.$k$pI've met other nobles like me,
people from tribes that don't exist
on Elyos...and you, of course.$k$pTime is more valuable than any gem,
and you've devoted a considerable
portion of yours to me. Thank you.$k$pI truly appreciate every moment we
have spent together. And, if I may,
I hope there are many more to come.
I will protect everyone!
Allow me to dazzle you!
I beg your pardon!
May I cut in?
The ball is over...
I'm so grateful to have been invited to this lovely place.
Oh! Do you like my accessories? Let me gift you a set—then we can match!
The castle here would make a wonderful venue for a ball.
I'd like us to become friends, so let me start off with a gift. Oh, I know! What would you say to your very own island getaway?
I love your outfit! White is the most difficult color to maintain, but the effort is very much worth it.
I simply must train harder. There is no other way around my lack of skill.
As grateful as I am for this opportunity, I do miss my homeland. Brodia is my treasure. Perhaps I'll show you its beauty one day.
My pleasure.
Allow me.
Show me the way.
